topic.title: 3. Apps, plugins, tools installation from the Marketplace

body.p: 2 – Enable necessary components, which you needed

p.b: Figure 3-1. First installation steps from the Eclipse Marketplace

body.p: Read the License agreement for application and their additional components.
Toggle I accept the terms of the license agreements → Click Finish

p.b: Figure 3-2. Apps License Agreement during the installation steps

entry.p: During the installation process “Security Warning”, message will came on the screen. Click OK button to continue installation process.

body.p: After installation process, the Eclipse will ask for restart. Click Yes.

body.p: Go to the Marketplace again → open the Installed tab and check that your app in the list.
